description: Creates a new event destination in a configuration set. An event destination is a location where you send message events. The event options are Amazon CloudWatch, Amazon Data Firehose, or Amazon SNS. For example, when a message is delivered successfully, you can send information about that event to an event destination, or send notifications to endpoints that are subscribed to an Amazon SNS topic. You can only create one event destination at a time. You must provide a value for a single event destination using either CloudWatchLogsDestination, KinesisFirehoseDestination or SnsDestination. If an event destination isn't provided then an exception is returned. Each configuration set can contain between 0 and 5 event destinations. Each event destination can contain a reference to a single destination, such as a CloudWatch or Firehose destination.

parameters.name: ConfigurationSetName
parameters.description: Either the name of the configuration set or the configuration set ARN to apply event logging to. The ConfigurateSetName and ConfigurationSetArn can be found using the  DescribeConfigurationSets action.

parameters.name: EventDestinationName
parameters.description: The name that identifies the event destination.

parameters.name: MatchingEventTypes
parameters.description: An array of event types that determine which events to log. If 'ALL' is used, then AWS End User Messaging SMS and Voice logs every event type. (string) ---

parameters.name: CloudWatchLogsDestination
parameters.description: An object that contains information about an event destination for logging to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Identity and Access Management role that is able to write event data to an Amazon CloudWatch destination. The name of the Amazon CloudWatch log group that you want to record events in.

nested_params.name: IamRoleArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Identity and Access Management role that is able to write event data to an Amazon CloudWatch destination.

nested_params.name: LogGroupArn
nested_params.description: The name of the Amazon CloudWatch log group that you want to record events in.

parameters.name: KinesisFirehoseDestination
parameters.description: An object that contains information about an event destination for logging to Amazon Data Firehose. The ARN of an Identity and Access Management role that is able to write event data to an Amazon Data Firehose destination. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the delivery stream.

nested_params.name: IamRoleArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of an Identity and Access Management role that is able to write event data to an Amazon Data Firehose destination.

nested_params.name: DeliveryStreamArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the delivery stream.

parameters.name: SnsDestination
parameters.description: An object that contains information about an event destination for logging to Amazon SNS. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon SNS topic that you want to publish events to.

nested_params.name: TopicArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon SNS topic that you want to publish events to.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: Unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. If you don't specify a client token, a randomly generated token is used for the request to ensure idempotency. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationSetArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the configuration set.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationSetName
nested_items.description: The name of the configuration set.

nested_items.name: EventDestination
nested_items.description: The details of the destination where events are logged.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: When set to true events will be logged.

nested_items.name: MatchingEventTypes
nested_items.description: An array of event types that determine which events to log.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchLogsDestination
nested_items.description: An object that contains information about an event destination that sends logging events to Amazon CloudWatch logs.

nested_items.name: IamRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Identity and Access Management role that is able to write event data to an Amazon CloudWatch destination.

nested_items.name: LogGroupArn
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon CloudWatch log group that you want to record events in.

nested_items.name: KinesisFirehoseDestination
nested_items.description: An object that contains information about an event destination for logging to Amazon Data Firehose.

nested_items.name: IamRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of an Identity and Access Management role that is able to write event data to an Amazon Data Firehose destination.

nested_items.name: DeliveryStreamArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the delivery stream.

nested_items.name: SnsDestination
nested_items.description: An object that contains information about an event destination that sends logging events to Amazon SNS.

nested_items.name: TopicArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon SNS topic that you want to publish events to.
